name: Szoftlab4
tagline: A WildPointers csapat BME Szoftver laboratórium 4 (VIIIA220) tárgyához kapcsolódó kódraktára
body:
## Welcome to the project page of the Wild Pointers! This is the webpage of a repository created by the students of Budapest University of Technology and Economics for an assignment connected to the course: Software Laboratory 4 ### The game This is basically a Tower Defense game in which you have to defend a mountain (Mordor) from the filthy elves, dwarves, humans and hobbits who are trying to reach it and toss the One ring into it. If they succeed you loose, if you kill all of them you win. The aim is to build towers in order to slow down and kill the enemy.

Good luck on your journey:) ### Download If you wish to download and try to compile the code for yourself, feel free to do so. (You can use the two download icons at the top of the page, or you can download through the repo) ### Authors and Contributors In 2014 the original source code was authored by the following brilliant gentlemen and a marvelous lady:

Balazs Czirjak (@czbalazs)
David Toth (@adtoth)
Odett Orsolya Torok (@FairyO)
Szabolcs Bana (@nyul)
Valentin Csontos (@vcsontos) ### Support or Contact If you find any issues with the code or have any suggestions, contact us via our github profiles.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
